item.title: ‘I’d hate to turn her over to the state’: My mother, who has dementia, refuses to be put in a facility. What can we do?
item.description: “She has never been willing to sign a power of attorney.”

item.title: Is the stock market open on Columbus Day/Indigenous Peoples’ Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: Be prepared for plenty of closures on Monday.

item.title: Be ready with these portfolio changes if the shutdown damages the Fed’s credibility
item.description: The Fed is making decisions without actual data — but investors are still banking on rate cuts.

item.title: Inflation was out of control in retirement, so I went back to work. I’m still working at 66. Was I right?
item.description: “Be more concerned with outliving inflation than Social Security.”

item.title: ‘I’m stumped’: I put $3,000 on my credit card during a vacation and my credit score plunged. Why is it so volatile?
item.description: “Doesn’t a 30-year history of good credit count for anything?”
